div.p: To Akousilaos and â€“isios and Timokrates and Dionysios and NN, laographoi of Theadelphia, from Harthotes son of Marres one of the public farmers of the village, about 41 years old. I own a house in the village, in which I myself live, registered for the polltax in the village, and ... son/daughter of Petesouchos, about 33 years old, and NN ... Farewell. Registered in year 27 of Caesar, Mecheir Translation: R.S. Bagnall - W.G. Claytor, GRBS 55 (2015) 649
